thread.title: The nuclear options for the East of England
thread.title_full: The nuclear options for the East of England | Anglia - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: The nuclear options for the East of England
text:
A new nuclear power station could be built at Bradwell in Essex within the next decade. Credit: ITV News Anglia British, French and Chinese cooperation that could mean new nuclear power stations are built in the East of England.
The government's on the verge of signing a deal that would give the green light to building new nuclear reactors at Bradwell in Essex and Sizewell in Suffolk.
The Essex plant is expected to be built in the next decade.
Click below to watch a report by ITV News Anglia's Serena Sandhu
Play video Last updated Mon 21 Sep 2015 Technology Bradwell Sizewell Suffolk Essex
